content.text: 同步执行命令并立即返回结果。Synchronously executes a command and returns the result immediately with comprehensive error handling.
包含状态码、stdout、stderr和成功状态的执行结果。Execution result with code, stdout, stderr, and success status

summary.text: 要执行的命令或文件URL。Command to execute or file URL

text.comment: 要执行的命令或文件URL。Command to execute or file URL

summary.text: 命令参数数组。Array of command arguments

text.comment: 命令参数数组。Array of command arguments

summary.text: 同步执行选项。Synchronous execution options

text.comment:
Function:

runSync

Description:

同步执行命令并立即返回结果。Synchronously executes a command and returns the result immediately with comprehensive error handling.

Returns:

包含状态码、stdout、stderr和成功状态的执行结果。Execution result with code, stdout, stderr, and success status

Example:
// Quick synchronous command
const result = runSync('git', ['rev-parse', 'HEAD']);
if (result.success) {
  console.log('Current commit:', result.stdout.trim());
} else {
  console.error('Failed to get commit hash:', result.stderr);
}
Example:
// Check tool availability
const dockerCheck = runSync('docker', ['--version']);
if (dockerCheck.success) {
  console.log('Docker is available');
} else {
  console.log('Docker not found, skipping containerization');
}
Example:

// Environment setup validation const nodeVersion = runSync('node', ['--version']); const npmVersion = runSync('npm', ['--version']);

console.log(Node: ${nodeVersion.stdout.trim()}); console.log(NPM: ${npmVersion.stdout.trim()});

Since:

1.0.0

See:

runAsync - Asynchronous command execution
